description: Israel's far-right Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich has advocated for the creation of a Jewish state that would encompass all Palestinian territories and neighboring Arab territories, including the Syrian capital of Damascus.
title: Smotrich says Israel must extend into Jordan, Lebanon, Egypt, Syria, Iraq, and S. Arabia

description: A United Nations inquiry said on Thursday it found that Israel carried out a concerted policy of destroying Gaza's healthcare system in the Gaza war, actions amounting to both war crimes and the crime against humanity of extermination, Reuters reported.
title: UN inquiry details Israeli 'extermination' of Gaza healthcare

description: The Israeli military “repeatedly” fired at UNIFIL headquarters and positions in southern Lebanon, injuring two members of the peacekeeping force, the United Nations says.
title: Israeli troops fire on UN peacekeepers in Lebanon

description: The United States ambassador to Iraq, Alina Romanowski, has denounced featuring Shia spiritual leader Grand Ayatollah Ali Sistani on an apparent hit list by Israel’s Channel 14, praising the Muslim scholar for “promoting a more peaceful region”.
title: US envoy slams ‘suggestion of targeting’ Ayatollah Sistani by Israeli TV

description: TEHRAN - Uzbekistan and Iran settled for a goalless draw in their AFC Asian Qualifiers – Road to 26 Group A tie on Thursday.
title: Uzbekistan, Iran settle for draw in 2026 World Cup qualifier

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi who was visiting Qatar on Thursday pushed for tapping all capacities in the region to bring an immediate end to Israel’s continued genocide in Gaza and preventing the Tel Aviv’s regime war on Lebanon and the demolition of the country’s infrastructure.
title: Iran seeks rapid halt to Israeli war on Gaza, Lebanon through regional cooperation

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi says the Israeli regime is dragging the entire West Asia region into a “catastrophe”.
title: Iran warns Israel pushing region toward ‘catastrophe’

description: TEHRAN - The Asian Football Confederation (AFC) has confirmed that the AFC Asian Qualifier- Road to 26 Group A match on October 15, 2024 between Iran and Qatar will be played at a neutral venue in the United Arab Emirates (UAE).
title: Iran – Qatar match in Dubai: AFC
